hero.title: Tenun Ikat Medali Mas
hero.subtitle: Kediri Cultural Heritage Since 1989
hero.description: Preserving the beauty of traditional tenun ikat with modern touches. High-quality products from the skilled hands of Kediri craftsmen.

about.title: About {highlight}
about.subtitle: A long journey in preserving Kediri's tenun ikat cultural heritage

story.title: Brief History
story.content: Founded by Mr. Munawar on February 27, 1989, UD. Medali Mas has grown from a home business to become one of Kediri City's leading SMEs in the field of tenun ikat.

vision.title: Vision & Mission
vision.content: To preserve and develop traditional tenun ikat art with modern innovation, creating high-quality products that make Indonesian culture proud.

location.title: Location
location.content: Located at Jl. KH. Agus Salim Gg. VIII, No. 54 C, Bandar Kidul Village, Mojoroto District, Kediri City - the center of traditional tenun ikat.

products.title: {highlight} Products
products.subtitle: Various high-quality tenun ikat products with traditional and modern designs

fashion.title: Fashion & Accessories
fashion.description: Fashion products with tenun ikat touch

partnership.title: Partnership Products
partnership.subtitle: Collaborating with other SMEs to present innovative products made from tenun ikat

items.name: SME Den Yu
items.description: Shoes & Sandals with tenun ikat motifs

cta.title: Interested in Our Products?
cta.description: Contact us for more information about products and current prices

achievements.title: Achievements & {highlight}
achievements.subtitle: Accomplishments and recognition for dedication in preserving tenun ikat culture

mainAchievements.title: Upakarti 2010
mainAchievements.description: Received the Upakarti Award in the Pioneering category 2010 for contributions in developing the tenun ikat industry in Kediri.

mainAchievements.title: UKM Award 2008
mainAchievements.description: Won the UKM Award Parasanya Kerta Nugraha 2008 as recognition for product quality and innovation.

additionalAchievements.title: Instructor Certificate
additionalAchievements.description: Appointed as a tenun development training instructor in the guidance of people with social welfare problems.

additionalAchievements.title: Pro Poor Award Nomination
additionalAchievements.description: Best nomination in the individual category of poverty alleviation work competition from the Governor of East Java.

statistics.title: Business Achievements
statistics.subtitle: Significant growth and development in the tenun ikat industry

items.title: Government Agencies
items.description: Trusted for office and institutional uniforms

gallery.title: {highlight} Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Collection of high-quality tenun ikat product photos from Medali Mas

process.title: Manufacturing Process
process.subtitle: From thread to beautiful tenun ikat fabric

preparation.title: Thread Preparation
preparation.description: Selection and preparation of high-quality threads with the best standards

dyeing.title: Tie & Dye
dyeing.description: Tying and dyeing process using traditional techniques that have been passed down

weaving.title: Tenun
weaving.description: Tenun process using non-machine looms (ATBM) by experienced craftsmen

finishing.title: Finishing
finishing.description: Final finishing and quality control to ensure the best product quality

cta.title: Want to See Products in Person?
cta.description: Visit our workshop in Kediri or contact us for product consultation

contact.title: Contact {highlight}
contact.subtitle: Interested in our tenun ikat products? Don't hesitate to contact us
